mail.subject: Rejected invoice No. ${input.code}
mail.content:
Dear ${input.billingInformation.firstName} ${input.billingInformation.lastName}

We are sorry to inform you that your order could not be approved for the reason below.
mobuyonline.com is really sorry for this inconvenience.


Kind regards,
Sales team
ArchNet ltd

action.display: Correctly changed status to rejected by archnet.
